title: What in the world is a semiconductor and why is it the backbone of artificial intelligence?
description: Semiconductors play a vital role in the global rise of artificial intelligence. Here is how you can gain exposure.
content:
In the midst of the artificial intelligence revolution, many investors might be looking to add exposure to this global industry.
Since 2022, it has fuelled the S&P 500 Index (SP: .INX) to record high after record high.
So just how much money are comp... [3091 chars]

title: US judge preliminarily approves $1.5 billion Anthropic copyright settlement with authors
description: A federal judge in California on Thursday preliminarily approved a landmark settlement of a copyright class action brought by a group of authors against artificial intelligence company Anthropic over the use of their work in its AI training, according to a press release from the authors' representatives.
content: Sept 25 (Reuters) - A federal judge in California on Thursday preliminarily approved a landmark settlement of a copyright class action brought by a group of authors against artificial intelligence company Anthropic over the use of their work in its A... [761 chars]

title: Why Apple Still Hasn’t Cracked AI
description: The company has long been the king of consumer gadgets. Bloomberg Originals shows how its shortcomings in artificial intelligence could put that at risk.
content: For decades Apple has held the crown when it comes to consumer gadgetry. Its products have relentlessly captured both the imagination and paychecks of consumers the world over, with new iterations of the ubiquitous iPhone reliably dispatching one riv... [671 chars]

title: Judge approves $1.5 billion settlement between Anthropic, authors
description: A federal judge on Thursday approved a $1.5 billion settlement between artificial intelligence company Anthropic and authors who allege nearly half a million books had been illegally pirated to train chatbots.
content:
By BARBARA ORTUTAY, Associated Press
